title: The Big Suey: Meadowlarkers 53 "Kyrie Irving and Joshua Primo"
description:
Tom Haberstroh, Amin Elhassan, and Kate Fagan dive into two of the biggest off-the-court storylines plaguing the NBA today. First, the lawsuit against Joshua Primo and the San Antonio Spurs alleging Primo exposed himself to multiple women, including a Spurs team psychologist, and that the Spurs ignored reports and covered it up. Then, the crew dives into Kyrie Irving and antisemitism, his initial press conferences, and the league's first reactions to his rhetoric.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
